manzils.text: 37|1|Sapatha tadera yara saribad'dhabhabe dandayamana [1]
37|2|atahpara yara kathora paricalaka [1]
37|3|ara yara'yikara' abrttite rata- [1]
37|4|niscaya tomadera ilah eka
37|5|yini asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera antarbarti sabakichura raba ebam raba sakala udayasthalera [1].
37|6|Niscaya amara kachera asamanake naksatrarajira susama dbara susobhita karechi [1]
37|7|ebam raksa karechi pratyeka bidrohi sayatana theke [1].
37|8|Phale tara urdhba jagatera kichu sunate pare na [1]. Ara tadera prati niksipta haya saba dika theke
37|9|bitaranera jan'ya [1] ebam tadera jan'ya ache abirama sasti.
37|10|Tabe ke'u hathat kichu sune phelale jbalanta ulkapinda tara pascad'dhabana kare.
37|11|Sutaram taderake jijnesa karuna, tara srstite drrhatara, na amara an'ya ya kichu srsti karechi ta [1]? Taderake to amara srsti karechi athala mati hate.
37|12|Apani to bismaya bodha karachena, ara tara karache bidrupa [1].
37|13|Ebam yakhana taderake upadesa deya haya, takhana tara ta grahana kare na.
37|14|Ara yakhana tara kono nidarsana dekhe, takhana tara upahasa kare
37|15|ebam bale, 'eta to eka suspasta jadu chara ara kichu'i naya.
37|16|Amara yakhana mare yaba ebam mati o asthite parinata haba, takhana'o ki amara punarut'thita haba
37|17|ebam amadera pitrpurusara'o?’
37|18|Baluna, ‘hyam, ebam tomara habe lanchita.
37|19|Atahpara ta to ekatimatra pracanda dhamaka---ara takhana'i tara dekhabe [1]
37|20|ebam tara balabe, 'haya, durbhoga amadera! Eta'i to pratidana dibasa.
37|21|Eta'i phayasalara dina, yara prati tomara mithya aropa karate.
37|22|(Pheresataderake bala habe,)'ekatra kara yalima [1] o tadera sahacaraderake [2] ebam taderaka, yadera'ibadata karata tara
37|23|allahara paribarte. Ara taderake paricalita kara jahannamera pathe [1]
37|24|Ara taderake thama'o, karana taderake to prasna kara habe.
37|25|Tomadera ki hala ye, tomara eke an'yera sahayya karacha na
37|26|bastuta tara habe aja atasamarpanakari.
37|27|Ara tara eke an'yera samanasamani haye jijnasabada karabe
37|28|tara balabe, 'tomara to tomadera sapatha niye amadera kache asate [1].
37|29|Tara (netrsthaniya kapherara) balabe, 'baram tomara to mumina chile na
37|30|ebam tomadera upara amadera kono kartrtba chila na; bastuta tomara'i chile simalanghanakari sampradaya.
37|31|Ta'i amadera birud'dhe amadera rabera katha satya hayeche, niscaya amara sasti asbadana karaba.
37|32|Sutaram amara tomaderake bibhranta karechilama, karana amara nijera'o chilama bibhranta.
37|33|Atahpara tara saba'i sedina sastira sarika habe.
37|34|Niscaya amara aparadhidera sathe erupa kare thaki.
37|35|Taderake'allaha chara kono satya ilaha ne'i’ bala hale tara ahankara karata [1]
37|36|ebam balata, 'amara ki eka unmada kabira kathaya amadera ilahaderake barjana karaba
37|37|baram tini to satya niye esechena ebam tini rasuladerake satya bale sbikara karechena.
37|38|Tomara abasya'i yantranadayaka sasti asbadanakari habe
37|39|ebam tomara ya karate tara'i pratiphala pabe
37|40|tabe tara naya yara allahara ekanistha banda.
37|41|Tadera jan'ya ache nirdharita riyika
37|42|phalamula; ara tara habe sam'manita
37|43|neyamata-purna jannate
37|44|mukhomukhi haye asane asina habe.
37|45|Taderake ghure ghure paribesana kara habe bisud'dha surapurna patra [1]
37|46|subhra ujjbala, ya habe panakaridera jan'ya susbadu.
37|47|Tate ksatikara kichu thakabe na ebam tate tara matala'o habe na
37|48|tadera sange thakabe anatanayana [1] dagara cokha bisista [2] (hurigana).
37|49|Tara yena suraksita dimba [1].
37|50|Atahpara tara eke an'yera samanasamani haye jijnasabada karabe
37|51|tadera ke'u balabe, 'amara chila eka sangi
37|52|‘se balata, 'tumi ki tadera antarbhuka yara bisbasa kare ye
37|53|‘Amara yakhana mare yaba ebam amara mati o asthite parinata haba takhana'o ki amaderake pratiphala deya habe?’
37|54|Allah‌ balabena, 'tomara ki take dekhate ca'o?’
37|55|Atahpara se jhumke dekhabe ebam take dekhate pabe jahannamera madhyasthale
37|56|balabe, ‘allahara kasama! Tumi to amake praya dhbansa'i karechile
37|57|amara rabera anugraha na thakale ami'o to hayirakrta [1] byaktidera madhye samila hatama.
37|58|Amadera to ara mrtyu habe na
37|59|prathama mrtyura para ebam amaderake sasti'o deya habe na
37|60|eta to abasya'i mahasaphalya.
37|61|Erupa saphalyera jan'ya amalakaridera ucita amala kara
37|62|apyayanera jan'ya ki eta'i sreya, na yakkuma gacha
37|63|yalimadera jan'ya amara eta srsti karechi pariksasbarupa
37|64|e gacha ud‌gata haya jahannamera taladesa theke
37|65|era moca yena sayatanera matha
37|66|tara to eta theke khabe ebam udara purna karabe eta diye [1].
37|67|Tadupari tadera jan'ya thakabe phutanta panira misrana.
37|68|Tarapara tadera pratyabartana habe prajbalita agunera'i dike.
37|69|Tara to tadera pitrpurusaderake peyechila bipathagami
37|70|atahpara tadera padanka anusarane dhabita hayechila [1].
37|71|Ara abasya'i tadera age purbabatidera besira bhaga bipathagami hayechila
37|72|ara abasya'i amara tadera madhye satarkakari pathiyechilama.
37|73|Kaje'i laksya karuna yaderake satarka kara hayechila, tadera parinama ki hayechila
37|74|tabe allahara ekanistha bandadera katha sbatantra [1].
37|75|Ara abasya'i nuha amaderake dekechilena, atahpara (dekhuna) amara kata uttama saradanakari.
37|76|Ara take ebam tara paribarabargake amara ud'dhara karechilama mahasankata theke.
37|77|Ara tara bansadharaderake'i amara bidyamana rekhechi (bansaparamparaya) [1]
37|78|ara amara parabartidera madhye tara jan'ya sukhyati rekhechi.
37|79|Samagra srstira madhye nuhera prati santi barsita hoka.
37|80|Niscaya amara ebhabe muhasinaderake puraskrta kare thaki
37|81|Niscaya tini chilena amadera mumina bandadera an'yatama.
37|82|Tarapara an'ya sakalake amara nimajjita karechilama.
37|83|Ara ibarahima to tara anugamidera antarbhukta [1].
37|84|Smarana karuna, yakhana tini tara rabera kache upasthita hayechilena bisud'dhacitte [1]
37|85|yakhana tini tara pita o tara sampapradayake jijnesa karechilena, ‘tomara kisera ibadata karacha
37|86|tomara ki allahara paribarte alika ilah‌guloke ca'o
37|87|‘tahale sakalasrstira raba sambandhe tomadera dharana ki [1]?’
37|88|Atahpara tini tarakarajira dike ekabara takalena
37|89|ebam balalena, 'niscaya ami asustha [1].
37|90|Atahpara tara take pichane rekhe cale gela.
37|91|Pare tini cupicupi tadera debatagulora kache gelena ebam balalena, 'tomara khadya grahana karacha na kena
37|92|tomadera ki hayeche ye tomara katha bala na
37|93|atahpara tini tadera upara sabale aghata hanalena.
37|94|Takhana ai lokagulo tara dike chute asala.
37|95|Tini balalena, 'tomara nijera yaderake khoda'i kare nirmana kara tomara ki tadera'i ibadata kara
37|96|athaca allahi srsti karechena tomaderake ebam tomara ya tairi kara ta'o [1].
37|97|Tara balala, 'era jan'ya eka imarata nirmana kara, tarapara eke jbalanta agune niksepa kara.
37|98|Ebhabe tara tara birud'dhe cakrantera sankalpa karechila; kintu amara taderake khuba'i heya kare dilama [1].
37|99|Tini balalena, 'ami amara rabera dike calalama [1], tini amake abasya'i hedayata karabena
37|100|he amara raba! Amake eka satkarmaparayana santana dana karuna.
37|101|Atahpara amara take eka sahisnu putrera susambada dilama [1].

37|102|Atahpara tini yakhana tara pitara sathe kaja karara mata bayase upanita halena, takhana ibarahima balalena, 'he priya batsa! Ami sbapne dekhi ye, tomake ami yabeha karachi [1], ekhana tomara abhimata ki bala?' Tini balalena, 'he amara pita! Apani ya adesapraapta hayechena ta-i karuna. Allahara icchaya apani amake dhairyasila pabena.
37|103|Atahpara yakhana tara ubhaye anugatya prakasa karalena [1] ebam ibarahima tara putrake upura kare sayita karalena
37|104|takhana amara take deke balalama, ‘he ibarahima
37|105|apani to sbapnera adesa satya'i palana karalena!’---Ebhabe'i amara muhasinaderake puraskrta kare thaki.
37|106|Niscaya'i eta chila eka spasta pariksa.
37|107|Ara amara take mukta karalama eka bara yabeha era binimaye.
37|108|Ara amara tara jan'ya parabartidera madhye sunama-sukhyati rekhe diyechi.
37|109|Ibarahimera upara santi barsita hoka.
37|110|Ebhabe'i amara muhasinaderake puraskrta kare thaki.
37|111|Niscaya tini chilena amadera mumina bandadera an'yatama
37|112|ara amara take susambada diyechilama isahakera, tini chilena eka nabi, satkarmaparayanadera an'yatama.

37|113|Ara amara ibarahimera opara barakata dana karechilama ebam isahakera upara'o; tadera ubhayera bansadharadera madhye kichu sankhyaka muhasina ebam kichu sankhyaka nijedera prati spasta atyacari.
37|114|Ara abasya'i amara anugraha karechilama musa o harunera prati
37|115|ebam taderake ebam tadera sampradayake amara ud'dhara karechilama mahasankata theke [1].
37|116|Ara amara sahayya karechilama taderake, phale tara'i hayechila bijayi.
37|117|Ara amara ubhayake diyechilama bisada kitaba [1].
37|118|Ara ubhayake amara paricalita karechilama sarala pathe.
37|119|Ara amara tadera ubhayera jan'ya parabartidera madhye sunama-sukhyati rekhe diyechi.
37|120|Musa o harunera prati salama (santi o nirapatta).
37|121|Ebhabe'i amara muhasinaderake puraskrta kare thaki.
37|122|Niscaya tara ubhaye chilena amadera mumina bandadera antarbhukta.
37|123|Ara niscaya ila'iyasa chilena rasulaganera ekajana [1].
37|124|Yakhana tini tara sampradayake balechilena, 'tomara ki taka'oya abalambana karabe na
37|125|tomara ki ba'alake dakabe ebam parityaga karabe srestha srasta
37|126|allahake, yini tomadera raba ebam tomadera praktana pitrpurusadera'o raba.
37|127|Kintu tara tara prati mithyaropa karechila, kaje'i taderake abasya'i sastira jan'ya upasthita kara habe.
37|128|Tabe allahara ekanistha bandadera katha sbatantra.
37|129|Ara amara tara jan'ya parabartidera madhye sunama-sukhyati rekhe diyechi.
37|130|Il‌yasinera [1] upara santi barsita hoka.
37|131|Ebhabe'i to amara muhasinaderake puraskrta kare thaki.
37|132|Tini to chilena amadera mumina bandadera an'yatama.
37|133|Ara niscaya luta chilena rasulaganera ekajana.
37|134|Smarana karuna, yakhana amara take o tara paribarera sakalake ud'dhara karechilama
37|135|pichane abasthanakaridera antarbhukta eka brd'dha chara.
37|136|Atahpara abasistaderake amara sampurnabhabe dhbansa karechilama.
37|137|Ara tomara to tadera dhbansabasesagulo atikrama kare thaka sakale
37|138|o sandhyaya [1]. Tabu'o ki tomara bojha na
37|139|ara niscaya i'unusa chilena rasulaganera ekajana.
37|140|Smarana karuna, yakhana tini bojha'i nauyanera dike paliye gelena
37|141|atahpara tini latarite yogagana kare parabhutadera antarbhukta halena [1].
37|142|Atahpara eka bara akarera macha take gile phelala, ara takhana se nijeke dhikkara dite lagala.
37|143|Atahpara tini yadi allahara pabitrata o mahima ghosanakaridera antarbhukta na hatena [1]
37|144|tahale take ut'thanera dina paryanta thakate hata tara pete.
37|145|Atahpara i'unusake amara niksepa karalama eka trnahina prantare [1] ebam tini chilena asustha.
37|146|Ara amara tara upara iyakatina [1] prajatira eka gacha ud‌gata karalama
37|147|ara take amara ekalaksa ba tara ceye besi lokera prati pathiyechilama.
37|148|Atahpara tara imana enechila; phale amara taderake kichu kalera jan'ya jibanopabhoga karate dilama.
37|149|Ekhana taderake jijnesa karuna, 'apanara rabera jan'ya'i ki rayeche kan'ya santana [1] ebam tadera jan'ya putra santana
37|150|athaba amara ki pheresataderake narirupe srsti karechilama ara tara dekhechila [1]
37|151|sabadhana! Tara to managara katha bale ye
37|152|‘Allaha santana janma diyechena.' Ara tara niscaya mithyabadi.
37|153|Tini ki putra santanera paribarte kan'ya santana pachanda karechena
37|154|tomadera ki hayeche, tomara kirupa bicara kara
37|155|tabe ki tomara upadesa grahana karabe na
37|156|naki tomadera kono suspasta dalila-pramana ache
37|157|tomara satyabadi hale tomadera kitaba [1] upasthita kara.
37|158|Tara allah o jina jatira madhye atmiyatara samparka sthira kareche [1], athaca jinera jane, niscaya taderake upasthita kara habe (sastira jan'ya).
37|159|Tara (musarikara) ya aropa kare ta theke allah pabitra, mahana
37|160|tabe allahara ekanistha bandagana chara
37|161|atahpara niscaya tomara ebam tomara yadera ibadata kara tara
37|162|tomara (ekanistha bandadera) ka'uke'o allaha sambandhe bibhranta karate parabe na
37|163|sudhu prajjalita agune ye dagdha habe se chara [1].
37|164|‘Ara (jibarila balalena) amadera pratyekera jan'ya nirdharita sthana rayeche
37|165|‘ara amara to saribad'dhabhabe dandayamana
37|166|ebam amara abasya'i tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosanakari [1].’
37|167|Ara tara (makkabasira) abasya'i bale asachila
37|168|‘purbabartidera kitabera mata yadi amadera kono kitaba thakata
37|169|amara abasya'i allahara ekanistha banda hatama.’
37|170|Kintu tara kura'anera sathe kuphari karala sutaram sighra'i tara janate parabo [1]
37|171|ara abasya'i amadera prerita bandadera samparke amadera e bakya age'i sthira hayeche ye
37|172|niscaya tara sahayyaprapta habe
37|173|ebam amadera bahini'i habe bijayi.
37|174|Ata'eba kichu kalera jan'ya apani tadera theke mukha phiriye thakuna.
37|175|Ara apani taderake paryabeksana karuna, sighra'i tara dekhate pabe.
37|176|Tara ki tabe amadera sasti tbaranbita karate caya
37|177|atahpara tadera aninaya yakhana sasti neme asabe takhana satarkikrtadera prabhata habe kata manda [1]
37|178|ara kichu kalera jan'ya apani tadera theke mukha phiriye thakuna.
37|179|Ara apani taderake paryabeksana karuna, sighra'i tara dekhate pabe.
37|180|Tara ya aropa kare, ta theke pabitra o mahana apanara raba, sakala ksamatara adhikari.
37|181|Ara santi barsita hoka rasulaganera prati
37|182|ara sakala prasansa srstikulera raba allahara'i praapya [1].
38|1|Soyada [1], sapatha upadesapurna kura'anera
38|2|baram kaphirara aud'dhatya o birodhitaya nipatita ache.
38|3|Edera age amara bahu janagosthi dhbansa karechi; takhana tara arta citkara karechila. Kintu takhana paritranera kono'i samaya chila na.
38|4|Ara tara bismaya bodha karache ye, edera kache edera'i madhya theke ekajana satarkakari asala ebam kaphirara bale, 'e to eka jadukara [1], mithyabadi.
38|5|Se ki bahu ilahake eka ilaha baniye niyeche? Eta to eka atyascarya byapara
38|6|ara tadera netara e bale sare pare ye, 'tomara cale ya'o ebam tomadera debatagulora pujaya tomara abicalita thaka. Niscaya'i e byaparati uddesyamulaka.
38|7|Amara to an'ya dharmadarse [1] erupa katha sunini; eta eka managara ukti matra.
38|8|Amadera madhye ki tara'i upara yik‌ra (bani) nayila hala? Prakrtapakse tara to amara banite (kura'ane) sandihana. Baram tara ekhano amara sasti asbadana kareni.
38|9|Naki tadera kache ache apanara rabera anugrahera bhandara, yini parakramasali, mahana data
38|10|naki tadera kartrtba ache asamanasamuha o yamina ebam e du’yera antarbati samasta kichura upara? Thakale, tara kono upaya abalambana kare arohana karuka
38|11|e bahini sekhane abasya'i parajita habe, purbabati dalasamuhera mata [1].
38|12|Edera age'o rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila nuhera sampradaya, ‘ada o kilaka'oyala phira'a'una [1]
38|13|samuda, luta sampradaya o a'ika'ra adhibasi; ora chila eka-ekati bisala bahini.
38|14|Tadera pratyeke'i rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila. Phale tadera ksetre amara sasti chila yathartha..
38|15|Ara era to kebala apeksa karache ekati matra pracanda sabdera, yate kono birama thakabe na [1].
38|16|Ara tara bale, 'he amadera raba! Hisaba dibasera age'i amadera prapya [1] amaderake sighra'i diye dina
38|17|tara ya bale tate apani dhairya dharana karuna ebam smarana karuna amadera saktisali banda da'udera katha; tini chilena khuba besi allaha abhimukhi [1].
38|18|Niscaya amara anugata karechilama parbatamalake, yena egulo sakala- sandhyaya tara sathe amara pabitrata o mahima ghosana kare
38|19|ebam samabeta pakhiderake'o; saba'i chila tara abhimukhi [1].
38|20|Ara amara tara rajyake sudrrha karechilama ebam take diyechilama hikamata o phayasalakari bagmita [1].
38|21|Ara apanara kache bibadamana lokadera brttanta paumcheche ki? Yakhana tara pracira diniye asala ‘ibadatakhanaya

38|22|yakhana tara da'udera kache prabesa karala, takhana tadera karane tini bhita haye paralena. Tara balala, 'bhita habena na, amara du'i bibadamana paksa---amadera eke an'yera upara simalanghana kareche; ata'eba apani amadera madhye n'yaya bicara karuna; abicara karabena na ebam amaderake sathika patha pradarsana karuna.

38|23|Niscaya e byakti amara bha'i, era ache niranabba'iti bheri [1]. Ara amara ache matra ekati bheri. Tabu'o se bale, ‘amara yim'maya eti diye da'o' ebam kathaya se amara prati praadhan'ya bistara kareche.

38|24|Da'uda balalena, 'tomara bheritike tara bherigulora sange yukta karara dabi kare se tomara prati yuluma kareche. Ara sarikadera aneke eke an'yera upara to simalanghana kare thake---kare na sudhu yara imana ane ebam satkaja kare, ara tara sankhyaya sbalpa.’ Ara da'uda bujhate paralena, amara to take pariksa karalama. Atahpara tini tara rabera kache ksama prarthana karalena ebam nata haye lutiye paralena [1], ara tamra abhimukhi halena.
38|25|Atahpara amara tara krati ksama karalama. Ara niscaya amadera kache tara jan'ya rayeche naikatyera maryada o uttama pratyabartanasthala.

38|26|‘He da'uda! Amara apanake yamine khalipha baniyechi, ata'eba apani lokadera madhye subicara karuna ebam kheyala-khusira anusarana karabena na. Kenana eta apanake allahara patha theke bicyuta karabe.’ Niscaya yara allahara patha theke bhrasta haya tadera jan'ya rayeche kathina sasti. Karana, tara bicara dinake bhule ache.

38|27|Ara amara asamana, yamina o e duyera madhyabarti kono kichu'i anarthaka srsti karini [1]. Anarthaka srsti karara dharana tadera yara kuphari kareche, kaje'i yara kuphari kare tadera jan'ya rayeche agunera durbhoga.
38|28|Yara imana ane o satkaja kare amara ki taderake yamine biparyaya srstikaridera samana ganya karaba? Naki amara muttakiderake aparadhidera samana ganya karaba
38|29|eka mubaraka kitaba, eta amara apanara prati nayila karechi, yate manusa era ayatasamuhe gabhirabhabe cinta kare ebam yate bodhasaktisampanna byaktira grahana kare upadesa.
38|30|Ara amara da'udake dana karalama sula'imana [1]. Kata'i na uttama banda tini! Niscaya tini chilena atisaya allaha abhimukhi.
38|31|Yakhana bikele tara samane drutagami utkrsta asbarajike [1] pesa kara hala
38|32|takhana tini balalena, 'ami to amara rabera smarana hate bimukha haye aisbarya pritite magna haye parechi, edike surya pardara arale cale geche
38|33|‘eguloke amara kache phiriye ana.' Tarapara tini egulora pa ebam gala chedana karate lagalena [1].
38|34|Ara abasya'i amara sula'imanake pariksa karalama ebam tara asanera upara rakhalama ekati dhara [1]; tarapara sula'imana amara abhimukhi halena.
